enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The contact group considered a revised draft decision.
Parties said their positions on the progress of implementing response measures remained unchanged and agreed to leave text bracketed.
On insurance, the EU emphasized that the impact of implementing response measures is not an insurable risk and, supported by the US, requested deleting text to this effect.
The US questioned the use of a forum on insurance and the basis for the proposed elements of its work programme.
SAUDI ARABIA emphasized the need for continuous discussions on insurance.
He suggested that the forum, composed of interested Parties, representatives of intergovernmental organizations, the financial and insurance sector, meet bi-annually.
Regarding modeling, the EU, opposed by SAUDI ARABIA, suggested deleting reference to establishing an expert group.
Negotiations continued late into the night.
